name: Gerhard W. Dueck
content: Gerhard Dueck Gerhard W. Dueck B.Sc.(First Class Honours) in CS(University of Manitoba) Master of Science(CS) (University of Manitoba) Ph.D.(CS) (University of Manitoba) Professor Address : Tel : Fax : office : email : Gerhard W. Dueck, Faculty of Computer Science, University of New Brunswick P.O. Box 4400, Fredericton, N.B. CANADA (506) 451-6963 (506) 453-3566 GC 109 gdueck@unb.ca Teaching Activities See D2L Research Interests Reversible Logic - International Workshop Multiple-Valued Logic - ISMVL Minimization of Logic Functions Symmetric Functions Simulated Annealing Reed-Muller Expansions - Reed-Muller Workshop Digital Design Garbage Collection Techniques for the Java Virtual Machine - CASA Publications Link to Publications Publications with the Group for Computer Architecture at the University of Bremen RevLib an online resource for reversible functions and reversible circuits. Professional Activities Section Treasurer of the IEEE New Brunswick Chapter. Member at large of the Technical Committee on Multiple-Valued Logic. Member of the editorial board of Journal of Multiple-Valued Logic and Soft Computing. Homepage          CS Homepage
